legal_1_0.source: The parties hereby agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this binding contract.

legal_1_1.source: The defendant was found guilty of all charges and sentenced to five years of incarceration.

legal_1_2.source: According to Section 8.3 of the agreement, the tenant must provide 30 days' notice before vacating.

legal_1_3.source: The plaintiff seeks damages for breach of contract and emotional distress.

legal_1_4.source: In accordance with the tax code, all income from foreign sources must be reported on Schedule B.

legal_1_5.source: The court granted a temporary restraining order pending the outcome of the hearing.

legal_1_6.source: Intellectual property rights shall remain with the creator unless explicitly transferred in writing.
